attributes.action: Minimum Wage for all MP's for one year
attributes.additional_details: In the face of public sector job and pensions cuts and various other austerity measures and with 2.51million unemployed in the U.K,we the undersigned publicly call for MP's and their support teams to lead this country from the front and work for one whole year of their time in parliament for adult minimum wage @ £6.08p per hour.
